DOC.criteria: Chronic TBI patient : Inclusion Criteria Have history head trauma manifest one following : Loss consciousness Posttraumatic amnesia Focal neurologic deficit , seizure Persistent symptom increase arousal ( e.g . difficulty fall stay asleep , anger hypervigilance ) Impairment social , occupational , important area function ( e.g . problem work relationship . ) Exclusion Criteria Inability obtain informed consent noncommunicative ( i.e . vegetative state ) . Healthy volunteer : Inclusion Criteria No significant medical history Take medication ( birth control pill ) Fever free No history head trauma recent injury/infection No history neurological psychiatric disorder alcohol drug dependency . Exclusion Criteria Inability provide inform consent age/gender match available TBI cohort
